description: Try our easy to follow Hot Smoked Salmon Dip With Bagel Crisps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bagel,Christmas,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Dec 2019,Budget,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Hot Smoked Salmon Dip With Bagel Crisps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup dill (plus extra sprigs to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Brush bagel pieces with garlic butter and place onto trays. Bake for 20 minutes or until lightly browned. Transfer to a wire rack to cool.
Meanwhile, combine onion and vinegar in a bowl and set aside for 20 minutes. Drain.

Process cream cheeses, dill, zest, lime juice and milk in a food processor until smooth. Transfer to a bowl and stir in salmon. Spoon onto serving plates with onion, capers and extra dill. Serve with bagel crisps and lime wedges.
